scenario.name: register_client
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:2009019@sip.avaya8.com>; tag=111111 To: <sip:2009019@sip.avaya8.com> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: sip:1111@[local_ip]:[local_port] X-Cyara-Peer: DEV-EP-TO-AVAYA-SECURE Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 1800 User-Agent: SIPp/Linux Content-Length: 0
